abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid33043283, pmid33113054, pmid33107617, pmid33113295, pmid33112937, pmid33107926, pmid33113212, pmid33098693, pmid33104160, pmid32846056, pmid33107641, pmid33104161, pmid33104267, pmid33108542
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2020.11.03
